ISSUE.TITLE: Track encoding valiation throws error for additional metadata
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The additional track metadata only made it into track.create.json and not track.json. An exception is thrown and logged on encoding, still the properties are included in the output. add the properties to track.json.
